alert.note: Alert for Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Mower County through 730 PM CDT... At 659 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Austin, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Austin, Brownsdale, Lyle, Rose Creek, Lansing, Mayville, Dexter, Mapleview, Waltham, Sargeant, Renova, Varco. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 175 and 193, and near mile marker 196. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Minnesota.
